Description:
A neat and comfortable package!
Appealing to holiday makers or permanent residents, this single level home is a short stroll to the popular Red Rocks beach and a short drive to all Cowes has to offer.
Boasting spacious central living zone, separate timber kitchen/dining area, three bedrooms, sunroom and a fully renovated family bathroom.
There is also a bungalow which could be converted into a fourth bedroom/studio/home office that is fitted with a split system heating/cooling unit.
Other great features include split system heating/cooling, single garage, single carport with roller door, fruit trees, veggie garden and a front undercover entertainment area with a wood fire/pizza oven.
All of this is set within a 583sqm (approx) corner allotment with private, low maintenance surrounds.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
ROOM FOR ALL THE FAMILY BACKS ON TO THE BEACH ACCESS TRACK
A modern, quality-built brick home that is perfect for everyday living as well as entertaining. Situated in a great location in one of Cowes landmark newer estates, it backs onto the beach access track.
Walk through the door into an ample, inviting entry that naturally draws you into the expansive, open central living spaces. With access from the living spaces into a fully enclosed wintergarden via 4-panel glass sliding doors, it is ideal for indoor/outdoor entertaining and dining.
A light, bright airy feeling runs through the whole property and the Bamboo floors through-out the living areas and carpeted bedrooms exude a real sense of warmth and style, while offering low-maintenance practicality.
This unique property has 3 large bedrooms, two with walk-in robes, and each with full en-suite.
It also has a smaller room suited at the front which could equally be furnished as a large office, additional living space or 4th bedroom.
The hostess kitchen is fitted with stone benchtops complete with breakfast bar, dishwasher and is accompanied by a walk-in butlers pantry. The central location makes it an integral feature of the home.
The finishing touch are the beautifully landscaped gardens, full of natives and plants designed to attract birds and butterflies. The yard is fully fenced, child friendly and perfect for pets.
This is a great investment opportunity and would be a popular with holiday tenants as weekend accommodation for family getaway.
OTHER FEATURES INCLUDE
-Internal entry through the garage
-Ducted gas heating
-Evaporative cooling
-Solar hot water
-Water tank
-Garden shed
Call Alex Scott Cowes today on 5952 2633 to book your private inspection.

Description:
Stunning Home matched by its Location
4 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Lock UP Garage, Study, Open plan with two living areas, Outdoor entertaining, 694m2 block what more can one expect.
Simply stunning home in the beautiful Shearwater Estate, strolling distance to Phillip Island Golf Course and Silverleaves beaches. Offering a peaceful haven to relax and enjoy island life. Immaculately designed home less than 8 years old offering all the features a modern family could desire, on a low maintenance 694m2 fully fenced block. Generous lock up Garage perfect for a family car plus small boat or camper van. With an open plan living area that invites you to spread out or take in the morning sun with the Alfresco dining space that opens out onto manicured lawn. Crimsafe flywire doors and plantation shutters throughout. Whip up those family meals in the sleekly designed kitchen with streamlined granite benchtops and modern stainless steel appliances. Full of light in every room, this property ensures comfort, with the perfect balance of carpeted bedrooms, double built in robes and easy clean tiled surfaces to all wet areas. With quality fixtures and fittings throughout including a gorgeous faux fireplace to create some ambience in the winter or simply pop the ducted central heating or cooling system on. An excellent full landscaped property with all the hard work done, just move in and enjoy.

Description:
Boat Ramp Beach House
Positioned in a sought after pocket in Cowes, beachside of Church Street - this fantastic corner property is just 230m from the Cowes Boat Ramp, cafe and stunning north facing beach, and a pleasant foreshore stroll into Cowes to access restaurants, wine bars, and shopping.
With delightful period charm, and a feeling of seaside yesteryear, this fully refurbished modern weatherboard and bluestone home offers a functional floor plan to accommodate either permanent or holiday living.
With 2 separate living spaces, modern kitchen and dining, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms (one which is a bathroom laundry combo). Polished floorboards throughout the home, and a neutral colour scheme provide a perfect backdrop, while a cozy open fire place, split system heating and cooling create a comfortable climate all year round. The home also has solar power installed to reduce those increasing power bills.
Outside there are a selection of spaces to enjoy, choose from the mediterranean style courtyard, the north-facing sun deck area featuring your very own pool, or the front patio to enjoy a coffee in the morning sun.
The double garage space has been cleverly converted into a single garage/undercover rumpus games room, workshop and a 4th bedroom or bungalow - complete with split system heating and cooling - the perfect space for a teenage retreat!
On this 768sqm approx. corner block, there is plenty of room for caravan or boat parking, with retractable front fencing - to open up the front lawn area, and a double width driveway around the side of the property.
Arrange your private or virtual inspection today, you are sure to be impressed! Opportunities like this don't last long..
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Lifestyle, Security and Convenience
This is an excellent opportunity to secure a fabulous apartment in the Oceanic complex, offered fully furnished, in the heart of Cowes within walking distance to everything. The spacious and tastefully furnished apartment comprises two bedrooms, both with built in robes, a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with laundry facilities as well as the dining and living space which opens onto a lovely private north facing balcony. The apartment is conveniently located on the first level and includes undercover parking with entry to the entire complex via a security pedestrian gate or gated driveway.
Additional features include dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, two split system heating and cooling units and intercom security. This would make a fantastic low maintenance permanent home or holiday retreat; all you need to do is move in!
Please phone Yvette on 0414 506 795 to arrange a Private Inspection or Virtual Tour

Description:
Stylish living with lake views
This immaculate home is ideally located within the popular Shearwater Estate with parkland and lake views. Exuding modern coastal charm, it gives you a relaxed and welcoming feeling from the moment you arrive.
It features three bedrooms, the master bedroom with a walk in robe and ensuite and the remaining bedrooms are serviced by a family bathroom and third toilet.
The contemporary kitchen has all you need with Caesar stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. The main living, kitchen and dining space is open plan with polished floorboards throughout and the spacious second living area offers additional space for all.
You'll enjoy a great sense of functional style throughout the home with its use of indoor and outdoor living spaces. The living and dining area adjoin the alfresco decking via sliding doors with stainless steel balustrades and enjoying the lake view.
Other features include two split system heating and cooling units, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, and spacious double garage all set on a low maintenance, landscaped and fenced 630m2 (approx.) parcel of land.
Retire with room for relations and friends, grow your own young family or earn extra income as a holiday rental, the possibilities are endless. Just a short stroll to the hub of Central Cowes, Silverleaves beach and Cowes Golf Club this home offers stylish living with everything at your doorstep.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Description:
Coastal Charm
Peacefully situated at the Red Rocks end of Cowes within walking distance to the fabulous north facing beach is this beautifully presented three bedroom home providing an excellent opportunity for permanent living, holiday makers and investors alike.
The freshly updated and charming home with new flooring and painting throughout comprises a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen area featuring a wood fire, split system heating and cooling and attractive timber look flooring creating a comfortable space for the entire family. The kitchen has plenty of bench space and room for bar style seating.
Adjacent to the living area is the hallway including the three bedrooms, all with built in robes, a light and bright newly renovated family bathroom, a second separate toilet and laundry.
A huge covered deck at the rear of the home is the perfect place to entertain family and friends all year round whilst a lovely east facing balcony provides further outdoor entertaining space.
The home is on a great sized fully fenced allotment of approximately 627 square metres (approx) providing plenty of yard space for kids and pets to play or for parking a boat or caravan. With drive through access to the rear of the property there is potential to build a large shed or garage STCA.

Description:
Escape to paradise
This character filled and immaculate single level home is ideal for permanent living, a great investment opportunity or the ultimate holiday home. Positioned in a quiet street within 650m walking distance from the Cowes Beach- what more could you want?!
Four robed bedrooms, two bathrooms and open plan living/kitchen/dining completes this floor plan, whilst a modern and neutral colour pallet is used throughout giving you a relaxed feel.
With entertaining in mind, the rear alfresco area flows effortlessly off the main living space and is complimented by an outdoor BBQ area with built in cupboards and sink.
Features include electric cooking, stainless steel kitchen appliances, cathedral ceilings, floating floors, three split systems; one of which is in the outside garage, a double garage that is currently being used as a man cave and side access allowing ample boat/caravan storage.
The generous rear yard provides plenty of space for pets and family or scope to landscape further. All this is set on an allotment of 657sqm (approx.)

Description:
Character-filled cottage with charm
This uplifting, immaculately presented, single storey home is fitting for those seeking a quiet permanent residence, an investment opportunity or even the ideal holiday retreat for those weekend getaways. Positioned within minutes of the pristine popular Red Rocks Beach, what more could you want!
The practical floor plan offers 3 generous bedrooms, two with BIR, a spacious kitchen with electric cooking and outdoor access onto the entertaining area leading through to the back yard perfect for those summer BBQ nights. The dining room is filled with an abundance of light flowing through to the separate living area featuring a cosy combustion wood heater, timber floors and high ceilings giving you the ultimate relaxed feel.
To complete the perfect package, there is also a fully fenced, low maintenance garden and a spacious double garage. You simply can't find better value!
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Description:
Sophistication on the Shore!
In one of the most incredible locations on the foreshore, with your balcony directly overlooking the north facing bay beach and situated in the middle of the main township of Phillip Island is this luxury top floor apartment.
Comprising three bedrooms, two bathrooms and two parking spaces this fabulous apartment with high ceilings and unique and modern design is an outstanding opportunity. The kitchen features beautiful stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances while overlooking the open plan living and dining area. The living area opens up onto a generous private terrace with superb views of the famous Cowes Bay Beach. Perfect for unwinding with a drink at the end of the day or entertaining with the whole family.
The master bedroom features a ensuite with a stone top vanity, large shower and toilet. It also opens up onto the outdoor terrace offering the highest luxury. The remaining two generously sized bedrooms both have built in robes and share the spacious family bathroom featuring large shower, stone top vanity, toilet and European Laundry.
The ultra chic apartment building provides lift access, secure undercover parking for two cars plus a storage unit, completing this amazing package.
Please phone Yvette on 0414 506 795 to arrange a Private Inspection or Virtual Tour
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Charming Beach House
Perfectly positioned within walking distance from Red Rocks beach, and just a few minutes drive into Cowes town centre - this 3 bedroom home oozes character, charm and personality.
Original timber floorboards throughout create a feeling of warmth, and french doors connecting the decking area to the living space, giving the home a real Hamptons feel.
Featuring an open plan living, dining and kitchen, boasting stylish white mosaic tiles, freestanding oven, canopy range hood dishwasher and timber benchtops. Convenient study nook / home office space, 3 bedrooms - master with walk in robe, and a family bathroom and generous laundry.
Other features include:-
Split system heating and cooling,
Electric wall heaters
Electric hot water service
Outdoor sink
Raised vegetable gardens
Set on a 603sqm approx. fully fenced block, the garden has been tastefully landscaped, creating a perfect sanctuary for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. There are 2 outdoor entertaining spaces, a workshop, garden shed and 2 water tanks. The kids have not been forgotten, with a fantastic cubby house, junior abseiling wall, and sandpit - for hours of entertainment.
This home would be perfect for permanent living, as a fabulous holiday property or weekender, or as a great addition to your investment portfolio for either holiday or permanent rental.
Call today to arrange your private or virtual inspection!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Your next Investment!
This four bedroom home is superbly located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac close to the central hub of Cowes and a short walk to Red Rocks beach. Suitable for the investor, this property has been a successful holiday rental and is being offered fully furnished. The modern kitchen features marble benchtops and stainless steel appliances which opens out to the dining area and lounge room with air conditioning. Sliding doors access the rear undercover deck and concrete seating around a paved outdoor area.
The master bedroom has a walk through wardrobe and main bathroom with shower, toilet, basin and corner spa bath. A second bathroom is configured for disabled access with a basin, toilet and no step shower. A convenient third toilet is also located near the second bathroom. With plenty of space for all the family there is also a separate games room with pool table and table tennis table and the home is currently furnished to sleep fourteen people.
The outdoor area also features a decorative pond with child proof fencing and a further area that can be isolated by two pedestrian gates to contain pets. The mains electricity with an earth leakage safety switch is supplemented by a 1.88 kw roof solar array and the electric storage hot water is fed from a rooftop solar storage hot water system ensuring energy efficiency.
A double undercover carport provides plenty of parking and storage space. Offered on a walk in, walk out basis everything is included to make this your own holiday rental earner or just walk in and enjoy your new holiday home for all your family.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Description:
Prime Location!
Presenting a great opportunity for those in need of lots of space and close proximity to the shops, cafes, restaurants, beach, school and much more, is this fabulous beautifully renovated five bedroom double storey home situated in a prime location in the gorgeous seaside town of Cowes.
Spread over two levels, the downstairs area features light grey walls to compliment the attractive and durable polished concrete flooring throughout the spacious living, kitchen and dining area. Smart black fixtures and fittings teamed with white cabinetry are a feature throughout the kitchens and bathrooms on both levels. Also on this level are two good sized bedrooms, both carpeted, making it an ideal space for teenagers.
External stairs lead up to the second level boasting a further three bedrooms, the second bathroom, a third separate toilet, laundry and a spacious light filled kitchen, living and dining area with polished timber floors throughout and split system heating and cooling.
An amazing huge outdoor entertaining deck on the second level captures year round sun and is the perfect space to relax with family and friends. The property has a lovely private back yard, and is fully fenced with a low maintenance garden and also provides ample parking space with access to the rear.
Set on a fully fenced low maintenance 591sqm approx allotment makes this home ideal for large families or dual occupancy whether it be as a permanent home or as a wonderful coastal retreat. Inspection of this fantastic property is a must!
Please call to arrange your private or virtual inspection 0414 506 795 A walk through video is also available upon request.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
